verbs.description: [ARG1: harrisburg man] [V: cited] [ARG2: for shooting deer with bow and arrow in harrisburg residential neighborhood] a harrisburg man has been cited by the pennsylvania game commission after he allegedly shot a deer with a bow and arrow in a residential neighborhood in susquehanna township last week according to the game commission and a pennlive com report brian k harrisburg arrow bow
